Claim: "A male guitar player is vigorously singing a not to a song in a poorly lit room."
Referring expressions: Male guitar player, not to a song, poorly lit room.  A man, indoors
Formula: (exists c (exists a (IsMale(a) and IsSinging(a) and IsInPoorlyLitRoom(c))) & (forall f (forall g (  IsInPoorlyLitRoom(f) ->   IsIndoors(g)))) & (forall i (forall h (  IsIndoors(h) ->   IsInPoorlyLitRoom(i))))) -> (exists e (exists d (IsSinging(d) and IsIndoors(e))))
